sentence.Network_en: I think your concern is misplaced. Ackroyd is no threat to anyone.
sentence.Network_cn: 我认为你多虑了，阿克罗伊德不会对任何人构成威胁。

sentence.Network_en: Somehow the suitcase with my clothes was misplaced.
sentence.Network_cn: 不知怎的，我忘了把装衣服的箱子放到哪里去了。
很遗憾,事实证明他不应该如此乐观.

entry.tran: (感情、行动)不适当的，不得体的，搞错对象的
entry.def: If you describe a feeling or action as misplaced, you are critical of it because you think it is inappropriate, or directed towards the wrong thing or person.

example.ex: Lenders rely on the misplaced loyalty of existing borrowers to make their profit...
example.tran: 放贷人指望现有借贷人的盲目忠诚来谋求利益。

example.ex: I think your concern is misplaced. Ackroyd is no threat to anyone.
example.tran: 我认为你多虑了，阿克罗伊德不会对任何人构成威胁。

means.word_mean: 1. put in the wrong place or position;

sentences.sentence: "She was penalized for a spelling mistake or a misplaced accent"

means.word_mean: 2. lost temporarily; as especially put in an unaccustomed or forgotten place;
